short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A personalized online shopping price tracker

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A personalized price tracker extension for chrome.

Usage : 
1) Please sign up and create a account
2) Click add 
3) Add the urls of products one by one
4) Wait for server confirmation - usually takes a day
5) Whenever the prices drop you will receive a mail from krabbysoft!
6) To check your current subscriptions just click the icon
